overview: "Will you cum on my braces?" That was the first thing Natalie said when she ran into our office. Jenna Ross wanted to get pregnant so bad she walked around with a pillow under her t-shirt screaming, "Cum inside me, cum inside me!" Katerina had an ass for days and wouldn't stop shaking and twerkin' it for us all to admire. And Jade was a delight, she's a hippie at heart and would suck anyone's cock that would let her (that's her with the perfect, young, natural boobs to the left). This is an amazing bunch of girls with a ton of sexual energy, they were all definitely Born Flirty! It's a must see.
title: Born Flirty 6
